meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brigid Hannahoe Tyler Shattuck David Bradley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7246.

td.p: Brigid Hannahoe, a pathologist from Buffalo, New York
Tyler Shattuck, a graduate student from Long Beach, California
David Bradley, an author from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,000)

tr.td: LEAP DAY
FURNITURE
ANIMATED TV
LANDMARKS
WHICH PLANET?
"RTH"
(Alex: Those three letters coming up at the end of each correct response.)
